scripts.test:ci: nyc yarn test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage/coverage.lcov
scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.npm.config.js && rollup -c rollup.browser.config.js && rollup -c rollup.browser.min.config.js
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && yarn clean
scripts.postpublish: aws s3 cp dist/indigo-trace-sdk.js s3://stratumn-libs/indigo-trace-sdk.js --region 'eu-west-1' && aws s3 cp dist/indigo-trace-sdk.min.js s3://stratumn-libs/indigo-trace-sdk.min.js --region 'eu-west-1' && aws s3 cp dist/indigo-trace-sdk.js s3://stratumn-libs/indigo-trace-sdk-${npm_package_version}.js --region 'eu-west-1' && aws s3 cp dist/indigo-trace-sdk.min.js s3://stratumn-libs/indigo-trace-sdk-${npm_package_version}.min.js --region 'eu-west-1'
